abilities.rule: While a friendly **ORKS** unit is within 12" of Makari, if the Waaagh! is active for your army, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[LETHAL HITS]** ability.

abilities.name: Prophet of Da Great Waaagh!
abilities.rule: While this unit is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll and if the Waaagh! is active for your army, a Critical Hit is scored on a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+.
